title: Bloomberg Markets: Node Using AI to `Facilitate Discovery'

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Falon Fatemi Chief Executive Officer Node Discussing using artificial intelligence to help companies find sales leads.
